documentation.text:
@title Energy represents the sub-token in VeChainThor which conforms VIP180(ERC20) standard.
 The name of token is "VeThor" and 1 THOR equals to 1e18 wei. The main function of VeThor is to pay for the transaction fee.
 VeThor is generated from VET, so the initial supply of VeThor is zero in the genesis block.
 The growth rate of VeThor is 5000000000 wei per token(VET) per second, that is to say 1 VET will produce about 0.000432 THOR per day.
 The miner will charge 30 percent of transation fee and 70 percent will be burned. So the total supply of VeThor is dynamic.
@return balance amount of VeThor in account '_owner'.
@notice transfer '_amount' of VeThor from msg sender to account '_to'

@notice It's not a VIP180(ERC20)'s standard method.
 transfer '_amount' of VeThor from account '_from' to account '_to'
 If account '_from' is an external account, '_from' must be the msg sender, or
 if account '_from' is a contract account, msg sender must be the master of contract '_from'.

@notice It's a VIP180(ERC20)'s standard method.
 @return remaining the remaining amount of VeThor that the '_spender' is able to withdraw from '_owner'.
@notice It's a VIP180(ERC20)'s standard method which means approving a '_value' to be transferred to _spender from msg sender.

attributes.text:
@title Energy represents the sub-token in VeChainThor which conforms VIP180(ERC20) standard.
 The name of token is "VeThor" and 1 THOR equals to 1e18 wei. The main function of VeThor is to pay for the transaction fee.
 VeThor is generated from VET, so the initial supply of VeThor is zero in the genesis block.
 The growth rate of VeThor is 5000000000 wei per token(VET) per second, that is to say 1 VET will produce about 0.000432 THOR per day.
 The miner will charge 30 percent of transation fee and 70 percent will be burned. So the total supply of VeThor is dynamic.
@return balance amount of VeThor in account '_owner'.
@notice transfer '_amount' of VeThor from msg sender to account '_to'

@notice It's not a VIP180(ERC20)'s standard method.
 transfer '_amount' of VeThor from account '_from' to account '_to'
 If account '_from' is an external account, '_from' must be the msg sender, or
 if account '_from' is a contract account, msg sender must be the master of contract '_from'.

@notice It's a VIP180(ERC20)'s standard method.
 @return remaining the remaining amount of VeThor that the '_spender' is able to withdraw from '_owner'.
@notice It's a VIP180(ERC20)'s standard method which means approving a '_value' to be transferred to _spender from msg sender.

returns.remaining: the remaining amount of VeThor that the '_spender' is able to withdraw from '_owner'.

devdoc.title: Energy represents the sub-token in VeChainThor which conforms VIP180(ERC20) standard. The name of token is "VeThor" and 1 THOR equals to 1e18 wei. The main function of VeThor is to pay for the transaction fee. VeThor is generated from VET, so the initial supply of VeThor is zero in the genesis block. The growth rate of VeThor is 5000000000 wei per token(VET) per second, that is to say 1 VET will produce about 0.000432 THOR per day. The miner will charge 30 percent of transation fee and 70 percent will be burned. So the total supply of VeThor is dynamic.

approve(address,uint256).notice: It's a VIP180(ERC20)'s standard method which means approving a '_value' to be transferred to _spender from msg sender.

move(address,address,uint256).notice: It's not a VIP180(ERC20)'s standard method. transfer '_amount' of VeThor from account '_from' to account '_to' If account '_from' is an external account, '_from' must be the msg sender, or if account '_from' is a contract account, msg sender must be the master of contract '_from'.

transfer(address,uint256).notice: transfer '_amount' of VeThor from msg sender to account '_to'
